nodes.text: Judicials, or the Judicial Forces were members of the Judicial Department of the Galactic Republic. They were often tasked with working alongside the Jedi in policing the Republic, arresting gangsters, pirates, and other law-breakers.

The Judicials were formed from the Republic Army after the Ruusan Reformation. Those serving in the Judicial Forces served as a paramilitary force for the Republic until the Clone Wars, when they were incorporated into the restored Republic Military.
The official police force on Eriadu were also called Judicials.
